package com.patni.utils;

import java.security.MessageDigest;

public class MD5
{
    public static String getMD5EncodedString (String value)
    {
        String result = "";
        
        try
        {
            MessageDigest m = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
            m.update(value.getBytes("UTF8"));
            byte s[] = m.digest();
            
            
            for (int i = 0; i < s.length; i++)
            {
                result += Integer.toHexString((0x000000ff & s[i]) | 0xffffff00).substring(6);
            }
        }
        catch (Exception e)
        {
            System.out.println("Unable to get the MD5 encryption");
        }
        
        return result;
    }
    
    public static void main(String args[])
    {
        System.out.println(getMD5EncodedString("gaurav"));
    }
}
